name: Robert V.
text: But if by chance you could really start from 0...

name: Robert V.
text: Stop this search that's destroying you from the inside...

name: Earch
text: Is it related to your regrets ?

name: Chris
text: I was looking for someone, before I got here

name: Chris
text: My regrets, I'm expressing them towards her... I wish I could have told her...

name: Chris
text: So yes, I've been looking for her, and I have the feeling that Robert is now preventing me from pursuing that !

name: Earch
text: But I think you already know : that's not the reason you're here.

name: Earch
text: Something else lies dormant inside you that prevents you from answering the [color=red]Angel[/color]'s question.
